It's definitely a game.

This is certaintly a truly wonderful experience. I love how they created the enviroments and I always go back to every scene just to revive the moments. The soundtracks is amazing, and I never get tired of it, the only problem being that sometimes the songs are too short and end before the fight even ends. Overall amazing game, impatient to play the sequel, if there's ever one.

10/10

If you're on the third installment of Half-Life 2, you're probably already a fan. If not, then I'll give you a few details about this game that stood out to me particularly.

-Atmosphere: The Half-Life series has, by far, the best atmosphere of any game I've played. The combination of visual aesthetics and aural details immerse you. This is probably the biggest detail I don't see talked about enough.

-Combat: Every weapon connects very well and gives you solid feedback which makes the firefights feel fluid and dynamic. The big selection of weapons lets you decide how you want to play.

-Movement: As in every Valve game, the movement is very flowing. The ease of jumping and sprinting make the movement feel more controlled than in most games.

The Half-Life series is my favorite and I hope you consider these notes to play this game!

This is one of my favorite shooter-adventure-puzzle games and a classic that everyone should experience. Perfect 5/7 score. if you haven't played all the half-life games, you should. 
If you want an in depth review of the gameplay mechanics and content, many people have done a much better job than I could of explaining it. All I can do is whole heartedly endorse this masterpiece and say I’ve enjoyed every moment of it.
This game deserves a sequel. PERIOD. Valve get up off your lazy asses and make us a sequel to this.. the greatest video game of all time!
My pick for the "Game That Deserves A Sequel" award this year. Actually, has been ever since it came out.

I love Half-Life 2, Half-Life 2: Episode One, and Half-Life 2: Episode Two so much that I don't care how long it takes for a sequel to be released. I will wait for as long as it takes.
